name: Keepy
0:
”Alexa, Open Mister Keepy”
”Alexa, ask mister keepy to open "Gate Name".”
”Alexa, ask mister keepy to open gate.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mister keepy
Developer Terms of Use
des: If you have an automatic gate, you have at least once forgotten the remote control and stayed outside of your house. Keepy is the perfect solution for you: an intelligent remote control that allows you to open the garage door or gate using your voice assistant. Unlike most home automation gateways, a cable connection to the gate control unit is not necessary! Keepy is really simple to use, all you need is a WiFi connection!
